about_the_game:
Rotten Forgotten: A Whimsical Farm Revival Adventure.

Gather your friends and embark on a delightful agricultural escapade in Rotten Forgotten, a charming cooperative farming game for 1-4 players. Your once-thriving family barn teeters on the brink of bankruptcy, and it's up to you and your companions to breathe new life into the dilapidated homestead.

Cultivate a variety of quirky crops, tend to your eclectic menagerie of farm animals, and race against time to fulfill orders and save your beloved barn from financial ruin. With a perfect blend of strategy, teamwork, and lighthearted fun, Rotten Forgotten is perfect for playing with friends.

Co-op!

  • Engaging co-op gameplay for solo farmers or groups of up to four players. Play with keyboard and/or controllers.

  • Challenging time management as you juggle crop cycles and animal care.

Plant!

  • Dynamic farming activities including digging, watering, and nurturing plants.

  • Maneuver around stubborn obstacles.

Care!

  • Care for your animals: feed them, milk them, and trim them.

  • Discover and utilize power-ups to boost your farming prowess.

Protect!

  • Protect your farm from pesky wildlife.

  • Overcome unexpected power-downs that add an extra layer of challenge.

Will you and your friends turn your forgotten farm into a thriving agricultural wonderland, or will your efforts be left to rot? The fate of your family legacy is in your hands in this heartwarming tale of rural redemption.

Grab your tools and prepare for a harvest of laughter and excitement in Rotten Forgotten – where every withered plant and hungry animal is an opportunity for teamwork and triumph!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Quad Core I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 275 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Quad Core I5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 275 MB available space

short_description: Rotten Forgotten is a wacky farming game for 1-4 players. Team up to save your old family barn from going broke! Grow crops, care for silly animals, and fill deliveries fast. Watch out for tricky obstacles and race to turn your messy farm into a success.
